metadata.title: AI Style - Explore Photo & Video Effects
metadata.description: Browse our complete collection of AI photo and video effects. From AI kissing to muscle showcase, discover the perfect effect.

effects.title: Explore All AI Effects
effects.description: Choose from our extensive collection of viral AI photo and video effects.

how_to.title: How to Use AI Style Effects
how_to.description: Create stunning AI photos and videos in 3 simple steps.

steps.title: Choose an Effect
steps.description: Browse our library of trending AI photo and video effects. Select the one that matches your creative vision.

steps.title: Upload Your Photo or Video
steps.description: Upload a clear photo or video. For best results, ensure the subject is well-lit and clearly visible.

steps.title: Generate & Share
steps.description: Click generate and watch the AI magic happen. Download your creation and share it with friends or on social media!

items.question: Is it free to use?
items.answer: We offer free trials for new users to experience our AI effects. For unlimited access and faster generation speeds, you can upgrade to our premium plan.

items.question: How long does it take to generate?
items.answer: Photo effects usually take 10-20 seconds. Video effects may take slightly longer, typically 1-2 minutes depending on the video length and complexity.

items.question: Can I use the generated images/videos for commercial purposes?
items.answer: Yes, if you are a subscribed member, you have full commercial rights to the content you generate using our platform.

items.question: What file formats are supported?
items.answer: We support common image formats like JPG, PNG, and video formats like MP4, MOV. The maximum file size is 20MB for images and 100MB for videos.
